remarks: If the inner product operation is already a function, the functionalization of it is equal to the original operation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Aug-2015.)
statement:
ipffval.1 $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
ipffval.2 $e |- ., = ( .i ` W ) $.
ipffval.3 $e |- .x. = ( .if ` W ) $.
ipfeq $p |- ( ., Fn ( V X. V ) -> .x. = ., ) $.
